name: timers
title: Timers
description: Start, stop, and save countdown timers, directly in Raycast, with no external dependencies.
author: ThatNerd

commands.name: startCustomTimer
commands.title: Start Custom Timer
commands.description: Set a countdown for a custom amount of time.

commands.name: manageTimers
commands.title: Manage Timers
commands.description: View, start, or stop existing countdown timers.

commands.name: timersMenuBar
commands.title: Timers Menu Bar
commands.description: View, start, or stop existing countdown timers from the Menu Bar.

commands.name: manageStopwatches
commands.title: Manage Stopwatches
commands.description: View, start, or stop existing stopwatches.

commands.name: dismissTimerAlert
commands.title: Dismiss Ringing Timer
commands.description: Stop a ringing alert from a finished timer.

commands.name: stopwatchMenuBar
commands.title: Stopwatch Menu Bar
commands.description: View, start, or stop existing stopwatches from the Menu Bar.

commands.name: previewAlertSounds
commands.title: Preview Alert Sounds
commands.description: Play samples of different alert sound effects.

commands.name: stopRunningTimer
commands.title: Stop Running Timer
commands.description: Stop the running timer closest to completion.

commands.name: configureMenubarPresets
commands.title: Configure Presets in Menu Bar
commands.description: Configure which presets to show in the Timers Menu Bar.

preferences.name: selectedSound
preferences.title: Selected Sound
preferences.description: Sound played when a timer finishes.

preferences.name: volumeSetting
preferences.title: Timer Alert Volume
preferences.description: Volume of the alert sound. Decimal between 0 and 1.

preferences.name: ringContinuously
preferences.title: Timer Alert Type
preferences.description: Whether or not to play the timer alert sound continuously until dismissed.
preferences.label: Ring Continuously

preferences.name: showMenuBarIconWhen
preferences.title: Show Menu Bar Icon When
preferences.description: When to show icon in menubar.

preferences.name: showTitleInMenuBar
preferences.title: Show Title in Menu Bar
preferences.description: Whether or not to show the timer or stopwatch title in the menu bar.
preferences.label: Show title

preferences.name: copyOnSwStop
preferences.title: Copy on Stopwatch Stop
preferences.description: Whether or not to copy the elapsed time on a stopwatch when it is stopped.
preferences.label: Copy elapsed time

preferences.name: closeWindowOnTimerStart
preferences.title: Close Window on Timer Start
preferences.description: Whether or not to close the Raycast window when a timer or stopwatch is started.
preferences.label: Automatically close window on start

preferences.name: customTimerFormBypass
preferences.label: Skip form if arguments are given
preferences.title: Custom Timer Form Bypass
preferences.description: For the 'Start Custom Timer' command, skip the timer add form if any hour, minute, or second arguments are given.

preferences.name: newTimerInputOrder
preferences.title: New Timer Input Order
preferences.description: Order for input fields in new timer form.
